trans-unit.source: The type of the object referenced.
trans-unit.target: 所引用对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 元数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides a lazy indirect reference to an object and its associated metadata for use by the Managed Extensibility Framework.
trans-unit.target: 提供对对象及其关联元数据的延迟间接引用以供 Managed Extensibility Framework 使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 返回所引用对象的函数。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例，该实例使用指定函数来获取所引用对象。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> object that is created will be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 指示创建的 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 对象是否是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata and thread safety value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据和线程安全值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The thread synchronization mode.
trans-unit.target: 线程同步模式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata and thread synchronization mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据和线程同步模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode> for more information on thread synchronization and <xref:System.Lazy%602>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode>有关线程同步的详细信息和<xref:System.Lazy%602>。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 返回所引用对象的函数。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> object that is created will be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 指示创建的 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 对象是否是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata and thread safety value that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据和线程安全值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例，该实例使用指定函数来获取所引用对象。

trans-unit.source: A function that returns the referenced object
trans-unit.target: 返回所引用对象的函数

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The thread synchronization mode
trans-unit.target: 线程同步模式

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> class with the specified metadata and thread synchronization mode that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元数据和线程同步模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.Lazy`2" /> 类的新实例，该实例使用指定函数来获取所引用对象。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode> for more information on thread synchronization and <xref:System.Lazy%602>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode>有关线程同步的详细信息和<xref:System.Lazy%602>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 获取与引用的对象关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 与引用的对象关联的元数据。
